events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department focusing on software development roles.
A recruiter from our Engineering hiring team has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the application process.
Your resume and portfolio have been positively evaluated in the initial screening. We would like to discuss your experience further.
Thank you for your prompt response expressing enthusiasm for the position and availability for the upcoming interviews.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10 AM UTC. The panel includes senior software engineers from our team.
The technical interview has been successfully completed with positive feedback from the interviewers regarding your problem-solving skills.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 23rd at 2 PM UTC to discuss cultural fit and benefits information.
Your HR interview went well. The team appreciated your communication skills and alignment with company values.
An official employment offer has been sent to you detailing the software engineer position, salary, and benefits package.
We appreciate your feedback and enthusiasm regarding the offer. You have expressed a strong interest in joining our engineering team.
Congratulations on accepting our offer! We are excited to welcome you as a new Software Engineer on our team.
Your onboarding has officially started. You will receive access credentials and training schedules for your first week.
The hiring process for the Software Engineer position has been successfully closed. Welcome aboard and best wishes for your career with us.
